South Western Railway Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 904 Apprentice Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Jul 18, 2025, 16:10 IST
 Southern Railway
 904 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Jul-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 7,000 to 8,000




FOLLOW

South Western Railway has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for the 904 Apprentice Positions. Those candidates who have qualified in the ITI can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the South Western Railway Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Karnataka.

South Western Railway Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Apprentice	904	ITI

Age Limit for the South Western Railway Notification 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 15 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 24 years.

Selectio Process South Western Railway Notification 2025

Merit List

Salary Structure South Western Railway Notification 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 7,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 8,000 /- per month.

Application fee South Western Railway Notification 2025

For all Candidates: Rs. 100 /- 
How to Apply South Western Railway Notification 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the Recruitment or Career Page.
Check for the Apprentice Notification 2025.
Check the eligibility CRiteria.
If you meet the eligibility Criteria.
Click on the Apply online link.
Register with your email and Password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further usage.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	17-07-2025
Last Date of Application	13-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
